name: Super Kalkutta
overview:
Established in the year 1995, we, “Super Kalkutta Dust Control Fabrication”, are an eminent manufacturer and supplier of a wide range of Flour Mill, Food Processing Equipment, SS Pipe, Grinder Machine, Pulveriser Machine and Stainless Steel Conveying Machine. Our comprehensive range includes Fresh Flour Mill, Atta Chalna Machine, Flour Mill, Maida Mill, Besan Mill and Dal Mill. In addition to this, we offer Stone Destoner, Clip Fitting Machine, Eli Meter Of Guar Gum, Round Pipe and many more.

Our Team: Our team of proficient professionals has helped us in attaining a successful position in this competitive market. We are supported by a team of experienced and qualified professionals. These professionals have complete knowledge of the techniques to use advanced machines that are essential in manufacturing our range of Flour Mill Machine.

Quality: Since our establishment, we are committed to offer optimum quality range of Flour Mill Machine to the clients. For this reason, we manufacture all the products using premium grade stainless steel, which is sourced from renowned vendors of the market. Further, we have a quality control department at our premises, which is managed by a team of experienced quality inspectors.

Infrastructural Facilities: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at Indore, Madhya Pradesh. In order to carry out all the business activities in a streamlined manner, the unit is partitioned into several sections. These sections include manufacturing, quality control, warehousing & packaging and administrative. All these sections are equipped with the hi-tech machines and other resources that are essential in manufacturing Flour Mill Machine.

Domain Expertise: Over the years, we have emerged as a renowned manufacturer and supplier of optimum quality fabrication material . Quality-approved products, competitive prices, timely delivery and ethical business strategies are some of the factors that enable us to stay ahead of our counterparts in the industry.

Products & Services: Grinder Machine Pulveriser Machine Stainless Steel Conveying Machine Fabrication Service

offices.address1: Shabnam Complex, Near Hanuman Mandir, Palda, Nemawar Road
